code:
gantt
    title Sequential vs Parallel Requests
    dateFormat X
    axisFormat %L
    
    section Sequential (FinTech_LedgerService)

    Request B   :1000, 2000ms
    Request C   :2000, 3000ms
    Total: 3000ms :milestone, 3000, 3000ms
    
    section Parallel (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    Request A   :0, 1000ms
    Request B   :0, 1000ms
    Request C   :0, 1000ms
    Total: 1000ms :milestone, 1000, 1000ms
